name: Down the Hole (Lady_C, MrNiacin, ChrisVifzack)
description:
Dave is in a bad mood. He just got out of the cinema and the movie was really shit. He just can't wait to go home... But then, his keys fall into the sewers. Calling for help? Nah. Dave is just gonna go down the hole by himself and look for his keys. What could go wrong?

How to play:

WASD/ZQSD/Arrows to move around

Space to Jump

E to progress in dialogues

Left-mouse-click to shoot

The game has two endings!

-----------------------------------
Submission for Global Game Jam 2021 (Site: Graz, Austria)
Theme: "Lost and Found"
